attributes.additional_details: It would calm down whole situation around current crisis, there would be no need for £330 billion funding for businesses and through local charities donated money would get distributed evenly to the communities.
attributes.background: In light of the Corona Virus crisis please consider Universal Income for every adult citizen of UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
